description: Broker requests a phone call - should create call_requested notification only

messages.content: Hi Jeff, I'm reaching out regarding 699 Industrial Park Dr in Evans. Could you provide the property specifications including SF, rent, NNN, door count, clear height, and power?

Hi Jill,

I'd prefer to discuss this over the phone - there are some details that would be easier to explain in a conversation.

Can you give me a call at (706) 555-1234?

Thanks,
Jeff Wilson

notes: Phone number provided so AI should NOT send email response, only notification
